metadata.name: Whoami.EXE Execution With Output Option
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" with the "/FO" flag to choose CSV as output format or with redirection options to export the results to a file for later use.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\whoami.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /fo csv')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -fo csv'))) OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*whoami.*>.*'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" with the "/FO" flag to choose CSV as output format or with redirection options to export the results to a file for later use.
